creator: phani.rocks@hotmail.com
text: I'm having trouble embedding external PDF documents. May I know if there is any ability to include PDF documents or Is it still under development?

Hi,

Please don't use Bugzilla to ask questions. Better ask on the users mailing lists (in this case the most suitable would be fop-users [1]).
Jeremias Märki maintains an external add-on to include PDF documents in XSL-FO files. Have a look here:
http://www.jeremias-maerki.ch/development/fop/index.html
You may also find the following page of interest:
http://xmlgraphics.apache.org/fop/0.95/extensions.html#external-document

[1] http://xmlgraphics.apache.org/fop/maillist.html#fop-user

Thanks,
Vincent
creator: vhennebert@gmail.com
